org.apache.flume.api

Class SecureThriftRpcClient.UgiSaslClientTransport

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.thrift.transport.TTransport
      • org.apache.thrift.transport.TSaslClientTransport
        • org.apache.flume.api.SecureThriftRpcClient.UgiSaslClientTransport
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, AutoCloseable
    Enclosing class:
    SecureThriftRpcClient

    public static class SecureThriftRpcClient.UgiSaslClientTransport
extends org.apache.thrift.transport.TSaslClientTransport
    This transport wraps the Sasl transports to set up the right UGI context for open().

    • Method Detail

      • open

        public void open()
          throws FlumeException
        Open the SASL transport with using the current UserGroupInformation. This is needed to get the current login context stored
        Overrides:
        open in class org.apache.thrift.transport.TSaslClientTransport
